entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Victoria Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Beach 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -30.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.9°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
